definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: As it turns out, a handful of scientific studies show that chicken soup really could have medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 而且幾項科學研究也表明，雞湯的確具有藥用價值。

sentences.english: Lu Ding tea, medicinal value and nutrients from the benefit of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 路丁茶從藥用價值與營養元素上造福人類。

sentences.english: The Sargassum fusiforme setchell is rich in nutrition and has high value for food and medical purposes.
sentences.chinese: 羊棲菜營養豐富，食用及藥用價值高。

sentences.english: Bamboo fungus is not only nutritive, but also crisp.
sentences.chinese: 竹蓀除食用外，還有着很高的藥用價值。

sentences.english: Onions are among the vegetables known for their medicinal properties.
sentences.chinese: 洋蔥是衆多以藥用價值而著稱的蔬菜之一。

sentences.english: Ginseng is of great medicinal value.
The beauty of Luoyang Peony Chuo must not only, but also of great medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 洛陽的牡丹不僅丰姿綽絕，而且具有很大的藥用價值。

sentences.english: Sanguisorba officinalis L. is a hemostatic agent in TCM and has a higher medicinal value in clinic.
sentences.chinese: 地榆爲中醫臨牀常用止血藥，有較高的藥用價值。

sentences.english: Buckwheat Bean has a high nutritional and medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 苦蕎涼粉具有較高的營養和藥用價值。

sentences.english: Conclusion The findings reveal that Indigofera bungeana is a valuable traditional medicine and worth further study.
sentences.chinese: 結論本氏木蘭有較高的藥用價值，值得深入開展研究。

sentences.english: Snow lotus and snow cock belong to the national 2nd category protective animals with high value of medical function.
sentences.chinese: 雪蓮雪雞爲國家二級保護動植物，其藥用價值極高。

sentences.english: However, there are actual medicinal properties to Oregano as well.
sentences.chinese: 然而，也有實際的藥用價值，以及對牛至。

sentences.english: Contemporary dietetics thinks, lemon has very high officinal value.
sentences.chinese: 現代營養學認爲，檸檬具有很高的藥用價值。

sentences.english: The ornamental value and medicinal value of Orchid has already held the world"s attention."
sentences.chinese: 蘭花的觀賞價值和藥用價值早已爲世人矚目。

sentences.english: Wolfberry can make tea to drink, have a strong medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 枸杞子可以泡茶喝，有很強的藥用價值。

sentences.english: Xiaogongmao peanuts also has health care and medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 小紅毛花生還具有保健作用和藥用價值。

definition: to reduce the pressure (of a fluid)/to lower one's blood pressure/to lower (or step down) the voltage
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
